metadata.title: CVE-2023-2200 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 7.14 before 15.11.10, all versions starting from 16.0 before16.0.6, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.1, which allows anattacker to inject HTML in an email address field.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
